context.p: MigrateHyper-VThis section describes how to migrate StellarOne from version 1.0 to 2.x in Windows Hyper-V system. The migration is performed by attaching the external disk of previous StellarOne instance to the StellarOne instance running new firmware version. The migration will transfer previously configured settings to the new StellarOne instance:

li.p: The system configuration, including license, account information, security policies, etc.

note.p: Before executing a system migration, please back up your StellarOne data first.

step.cmd: Launch the new StellarOne instance. Please refer to for deployment details.
Click Browse and choose the existing disk.
Attach the external disk of previous StellarOne to the new StellarOne instance.
step.stepresult: The previous StellarOne's information will be migrated to the new StellarOne instance.
